name: stock-moves-explained
description: Explains why US stocks moved. AI-powered analysis for S&P 500, NASDAQ 100, and Dow Jones 30 stocks (~550 major companies). Answers 'why did [stock] drop?', 'what happened to [company]?', 'why is [sector] down?'. Covers news-driven moves and mystery moves with no obvious catalyst. Explains crashes, rallies, selloffs, and recoveries with confidence-scored analysis. Market intelligence - not price data or trading advice.

tools.name: explain_stock_move
tools.description: Get AI-powered analysis explaining why a US stock moved today. Covers S&P 500, NASDAQ 100, and Dow 30 stocks.

ticker.description: Stock ticker symbol (e.g., 'TSLA') or company name (e.g., 'Tesla', 'Google'). Supports common aliases like 'Facebook' for META.
